snippet: After past disappointments, Microsoft has paired its latest digital music offering with the Xbox and Windows as part of a broad set of bets to regain ground it has lost to Apple and other competitors.
abstract: Microsoft, after past disappointments, is paring its latest digital music offering Xbox Music with Xbox and Windows as part of a broad set of bets to regain ground it has lost to Apple and other competitors; service will offer access to global catalog of about 30 million songs.
lead_paragraph: After past disappointments, Microsoft has paired its latest digital music offering with the Xbox and Windows as part of a broad set of bets to regain ground it has lost to Apple and other competitors.

headline.seo: Xbox Music Leads Microsoft’s New Push to Challenge iTunes
headline.main: Microsoft Makes New Push Into Music
headline.print_headline: New Push By Microsoft Into Music
